description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Windows DPAPI spoofing vulnerability (CVE-2023-36004), apply the relevant KB updates as follows:

1. Determine your Windows version and architecture (32-bit or 64-bit).
2. Download and apply the updates corresponding to your system from the official Microsoft Update Catalog.

**Details**:
- For Windows 10, updates include KB5033379 for x64-based systems and KB5033372 for various builds.
- For Windows 11, updates include KB5033375 and KB5033369 that address this vulnerability.
- Ensure to follow the links for direct downloading of the updates, like [this one for KB5033379](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5033379).

**Preconditions**:
- Confirm that your system is running one of the affected versions of Windows.
- Backup any critical data before performing updates to safeguard against potential issues during installation.
